name: Alphamax (GB)
description:
This is a tiny shoot-em-up game, made in 1 day for GBJAM 5 ... so don't expect too much :)

The game is inspired by the DOS game Betamax from 1997.

You will have to fend off endless waves of 4 randomly selected enemies. With each wave the enemies will get stronger and move faster, but your ship will also gain more power or speed after every few waves.

Good luck!

October 9th 2016
